message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.LG, cs.MM. 

The paper deals with the minimum energy and cost required for transmitting information in asynchronous communication with sampling constraints. This topic falls under the field of information theory (cs.IT). The paper also discusses the use of adaptive sampling schemes, which is a common topic in networked systems (cs.NI) and control systems (cs.SY). The paper may also be relevant to machine learning (cs.LG) and multimedia (cs.MM) applications that involve asynchronous communication and sampling.
